cards.title: Afghans spend night in open after earthquake kills more than 800
cards.summary: Survivors of an earthquake in Afghanistan have spent a night in the open, as rescue efforts continue.

cards.title: Covered in dust and too shocked to speak': Afghan villagers reel at scale of qua…
cards.summary: At least 800 people have died in Afghanistan after a deadly earthquake, the BBC's Gabriela Pomeroy reports.

cards.title: Body seen in secret mortuary could solve 50-year mystery of vanished religious l…
cards.summary: In our series of letters from African journalists, the BBC's weekly The Boss series profiles different people from around the world. This week we speak to Musa al-Sadr.
